Uses of Interface
tagger.TagRepository

Packages that use TagRepository
Package Description
commander This package contains classes dealing with controlling the file tagging system. 
commander.commands This package contains the @see TSCommand objects of commands in the system. 
tagger This package contains classes for tagging files and searching for the files by these tags.

Uses of TagRepository in tagger
 

Classes in tagger that implement TagRepository
Modifier and Type Class and Description
 class TagRepositoryImpl
          This class represents a tag repository - which is a repository associating files to tags and uses events to keep track of those files.
